items.name: Tomato Basil
items.Description: (half 280 cal/large 560 cal) A gourmet twist on a comfort food icon. Made from fresh whole Basil, Tomatoes, & Sautéed Vegetables. This classic will get you hooked! Pictured with Orzo Pasta (+25 cal).

items.name: Garden Chowder
items.Description: (half 370 cal/large 740 cal) For the veggie lover, this soup is loaded with fresh garden vegetables combined with the heartiness of a classic chowder.

items.name: New England Clam Chowder
items.Description: (half 370 cal/large 730 cal) An American classic done right. This soup is rich and creamy, with the right blend of the ingredients you’d expect: clams, potatoes, and East Coast history.

items.name: Yucatan Chikcken Tortilla
items.Description: (half 110 cal/large 220 cal) Sometimes you need a little zest, and this has it all: chicken, tomatoes, and corn, with a little kick on the side. Just add a squeeze of lime from our drink bar.

items.name: Wild Mushroom Bissque
items.Description: (half 250 cal/large 500 cal) Elegant & smooth. This soup highlights the perfect mix of fresh shiitake, crimini, & button mushrooms.

items.name: California Protein Cobb
items.Description: (half 410-480 cal/large 610-720 cal) Choose Buttermilk Ranch or Fresh Herb Vinaigrette, Baby Field Greens, Chicken, Cage-Free Eggs, Applewood Smoked Bacon, Edamame, Grape Tomatoes, Black Olives, Goat Cheese, & Hass Avocado

items.name: Strawberry Harvest Chicken
items.Description: (half 390 cal/large 530 cal) House-Chopped Mixed Greens, House-Made Strawberry Champagne Vinaigrette, Chicken*, Strawberries, Fontina Cheese, Gala Apples, Dried Cranberries.

items.name: Garden Chicken Chop
items.Description: (half 380-450 cal/large 550-660 cal) Choose Buttermilk Ranch or Fresh Herb Vinaigrette, House-Chopped Mixed Greens, Chicken, Bacon, Sugar Snap Peas, Baby Cucumbers, Grape Tomatoes, Fire-Roasted Corn, Cheddar, & Foccacia Croutons.

items.name: Nuts About Berries
items.Description: (half 310 cal/large 450 cal) House-Chopped Mixed Greens, House-Made Poppyseed Dressing, Blueberries, Strawberries, Raspberries, Blackberries, & Cinnamon Almonds.

items.name: Bbq Pulled Pork
items.Description: (Ancient Grain 610 cal/Ciabatta 670 cal) All-Natural Braised Pork Shoulder, Fresh Herb Vinaigrette Cabbage Slaw, Sweet BBQ Sauce, & House-Made Honey Mustard.

items.name: Italian Club
items.Description: (Ancient Grain 600 cal/Ciabatta 660 cal) Genoa Salami, Turkey, Ham, Banana Peppers, Tomatoes, Alfalfa Sprouts, Baby Cucumbers, Mixed Greens, Muenster Cheese, & House-Made Balsamic Spread.

items.name: California Turkey
items.Description: (Ancient Grain 580 cal/Ciabatta 640 cal) Turkey, Hass Avocado, Tomatoes, Alfalfa Sprouts, Baby Cucumbers, Mixed Greens, Muenster Cheese, House-Made Buttermilk Ranch, & Roasted Red Pepper Hummus.

items.name: VEGETARIAN
items.Description: (Ancient Grain 490 cal/Ciabatta 550 cal) Roasted Red Pepper Hummus, Banana Peppers, Roasted Red Peppers, Tomatoes, Baby Cucumbers, Alfalfa Sprouts, Mixed Greens, Muenster Cheese, & Hass Avocado.
